reviews.review_msg: Kanya is kind and caring. The class was online, which Kanya struggled with. The lectures were informative but incredibly short. The grading criteria were unclear. The class average was high heading into the final exam, which was clearly used to scale down the class average. The final was not difficult but lacked any criteria or feedback.

She's very well-read and up to date on current events that are relevant to her teachings. She has a very open-ended method to teaching, where she presents material and lets you run with it.. I can imagine it would be a refreshing class to take IRL but it was poorly executed online, 8/10 prof in normal circumstances, 3/10 class overall online.
Great prof, on point and passionate. She's engaging and very open to listening. I love her recommended materials for the course and films. It's not easy but definitely a fair last year course.
A lot of reading but a good class and a committed instructor
Really great prof! Clear and interesting lectures, and I loved the documentaries.
Kanya is an amazing professor. She's really interesting and does a great job keeping everyone engaged. Also she's very easy on the eyes
I LOVE KANYA. SHE SO INTERESTING AND INTERESTED. VERY ENGAGED CLASS WITH LOTS OF DISCUSSION AND VIDEOS. AND SHE IS BEAUTIFUL.
I love her.  A lot of reading and a lot of hard work required but if you are passionate about the topic, it is worth the effort.  Not a course for slackers!
Don't miss classes.  Fair marker but picky on grammar.
She talks most of the class but is super engaging. Take notes she will repeat what is important and that will be on the exam! She prepares her students for success!

AMAZING PROF and REALLY PRETTY! Very engaging, a fair marker, and super helpful! She changed my perspectives on many issues and i learned a lot from her. I would take her class regardless of the topic, she is clear, concise, super easy going and GREAT to listen too
Very good teacher, clear and knows her stuff.  Classes are prepared and always interesting.
